overview: Secret Admirer is a film produced in Hong Kong, China in 1993. It was directed by Yang Quan , written by Liang Zhiming , Xu Manhua , Wu Yurong, Mai Lilin, District Ling , Chen Jiabi , Pan Zhenzhong and Gao Fei . The film focuses on the story of two computer companies competing for a game software creator.
title: Secret Admirer
